monday-credentials.name: Monday Credentials
monday-credentials.description: Block used to manage Monday authentication. This block is part of the prefect-monday collection. Install prefect-monday with `pip install prefect-monday` to use this block.
monday-credentials.code_example:
Load stored Monday credentials:
```python
from prefect_monday import MondayCredentials
monday_credentials_block = MondayCredentials.load("BLOCK_NAME")
```
